description: This file declares exported API functions related to the Sys Rro Astr Object in the BroadWay Runtime System Environment, including functions for creation, initialization, removal, and object enrollment. It serves as an interface header defining function prototypes for external modules.

methods.name: SysCreateRroAstr
methods.description: Creates and returns a handle to a Sys Rro Astr object using provided context handles.

methods.name: SysRroAstrCreate
methods.description: Creates a new Sys Rro Astr object with the specified context handles.

methods.name: SysRroAstrRemove
methods.description: Removes a Sys Rro Astr object identified by the provided handle.

methods.name: SysRroAstrEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls required objects within the Sys Rro Astr object for proper operation.

methods.name: SysRroAstrInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Sys Rro Astr object.
